thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com
thread.title: Rebekah Fielding
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Rebekah Fielding

author: Rebekah Fielding
title: Rebekah Fielding
text:
Very easy to order from website.
Car seat arrived before expected, was well package and as advertised. Good communication during delivery to keep us updated on it arrival.
The car seat is brilliant. Using it as a rear facing seat for now and our daughter loves it. Very easy to install, would highly recommend.
